fullplot: Co-directors Robert Rodriguez and Frank Miller reunite to bring Miller's "Sin City" graphic novels back to the screen. Weaving together two of Miller's classic stories with new tales, the town's most hard boiled citizens cross paths with some of its more notorious inhabitants.
plot: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.
title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For

tomatoes.consensus: A Dame to Kill For boasts the same stylish violence and striking visual palette as the original Sin City, but lacks its predecessor's brutal impact.
